archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Security Monitoring - Maintain
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The SoC environment will constantly evolve to meet changes to the Threat landscape and other factors. These include; - Tuning - Inventory of monitored systems and monitoring configurations - Training of staff - Integrity of logs and configurations - Replay of scenarios to improve the solution or detect previously unbeknown incidents - Develop and Maintain use cases and detection criteria
